data.text:
E2E test: Page navigation timeouts (net::ERR_ABORTED)

23 tests fail with "page.goto: net::ERR_ABORTED; maybe frame was detached?"
Affects: picking.test.ts, playing.test.ts, reactions.test.ts

Root cause hypotheses:
1. Browser contexts not properly isolated between tests
2. Test parallelism causing resource contention
3. Frontend dev server struggling under load

Suspects: playwright.config.ts, test fixtures
Path to trace: Check worker count, browser context reuse settings, consider --workers=1
